articles.description: Premier League clubs meet to discuss whether to keep or scrap VAR from next season, plus reaction to international games and Euro 2024 build-up as England and Scotland prepare to name their final 26-man squads.
articles.title: Premier League clubs vote on VAR, plus Euro 2024 build-up as squad deadline looms

articles.description: USA play Pakistan in the Men's T20 World Cup in Grand Prairie, Texas - follow text updates radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: USA vs Pakistan LIVE: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 - cricket score, commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Gibraltar vs Wales in the Friendlies
articles.title: Gibraltar vs Wales: Friendlies - BBC Sport

articles.description: Crystal Palace pair Eberechi Eze and Adam Wharton are named in England's Euro 2024 squad, with Jack Grealish, Harry Maguire and James Maddison left out.
articles.title: England Euro 2024 squad: Eberechi Eze & Adam Wharton named in 26-man list

articles.description: Manchester City forward Jack Grealish and Manchester United defender Harry Maguire are set to be left out of England’s Euro 2024 squad.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Jack Grealish & Harry Maguire set to miss out on England squad

articles.description: Iga Swiatek continues her dominance over Coco Gauff to move one step closer to a third straight title at Roland Garros.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Iga Swiatek beats Coco Gauff to reach Roland Garros final

articles.description: BBC Sport takes to the streets of Manhattan to see if the locals know the T20 World Cup is happening.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: BBC Sport speaks to New Yorkers about cricket

articles.description: Wolves' hopes of scrapping VAR were defeated 19-to-1 in a vote a Premier League annual general meeting.
articles.title: Premier League vote in favour of keeping VAR

articles.description: James Maddison says "devastated doesn't quite cut it" after he is left out of England manager Gareth Southgate’s final Euro 2024 squad.
articles.title: James Maddison 'devastated' by England omission for Euro 2024

articles.description: The International Cricket Council has no plans to move T20 World Cup matches out of New York despite concerns over poor pitches.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: India voice New York pitch concerns but ICC stands firm
